info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 4:58PM EDT until August 15 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Rutherford County in western North Carolina... Northeastern Polk County in western North Carolina... West central Cleveland County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 457 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles northwest of Rutherfordton, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Forest City, Rutherfordton, Spindale, Ellenboro, Mooresboro, Bostic, Kingstown, Cliffside, Green Hill and Thermal City. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
